channel.title: Humble Indie Bundle
channel.description:
only 20 hours left! this is such a great deal, and i am loving the results of it.
This is a great idea, it goes to a great cause and you get some really fun games.
I wanna make sure everyone knows about this so they can get their last little bit of donations before it ends. and it is not fake or a scam, even check on [url]https://www.eff.org/[/url] they are legit and they link to it.
everyone should head over and donate some money to charity, and play some free games!
[url]https://www.wolfire.com/humble[/url]
sorry if this sounds like an add or something, i was really excited, but c'mon, they deserve it. :slight_smile:

item.title: Humble Indie Bundle
item.dc:creator: Sgt_smiles
item.description:
woah, just saw that, soooo sorry, couldnt contain my enthusiasm. for the record i feel my thread was better written…

lets pretend this never happened.

Read full topic

only 20 hours left! this is such a great deal, and i am loving the results of it.

This is a great idea, it goes to a great cause and you get some really fun games.

I wanna make sure everyone knows about this so they can get their last little bit of donations before it ends. and it is not fake or a scam, even check on https://www.eff.org/ they are legit and they link to it.
